naslov: Lokva Rogoznica, kuća s  bazenom, pogled na more (prodaja)
opis: NOVO U PONUDI!!! PREDIVNA LOKACIJA!!! Prodajemo prekrasnu kuću s bazenom u mjestu Lokva Rogoznica, idealno smještenu samo 500 metara od mora i plaže. Kuća, tlocrtne površine 127 m², sastoji se od dvije prostrane dvosobne stambene jedinice, savršene za obitelj ili turističko iznajmljivanje. Prizemlje kuće nudi stan od 63 m², s ulaznim hodnikom, dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonicom, spremištem i otvorenim dnevnim prostorom. Dnevni boravak vodi na natkrivenu terasu, oplemenjenu mediteranskim zelenilom, stvarajući idealno mjesto za opuštanje na svježem zraku. Na prvom katu nalazi se još jedan dvosobni stan s dvije kupaonice, hodnikom i otvorenim dnevnim prostorom. Iz dnevnog dijela izlazi se na prostrani balkon s kojeg se pruža nevjerojatan pogled na more i obližnje otoke. Ispred kuće, niže od prizemlja, smješten je bazen površine 25 m², koji nudi opuštanje uz predivan spoj neba i mora. Iza kuće nalazi se parking za više automobila, dok su katovi povezani vanjskim stepenicama. Kuća ima pristup asfaltiranom putu, te priključke za vodu i struju. Kuća je kompletno namještena. U blizini su svi potrebni sadržaji, poput kafića, restorana i trgovina, dok je grad Omiš udaljen samo 10 km, pružajući sve dodatne pogodnosti za ugodan život ili odmor. Kupac plaća agencijsku proviziju. Za sve informacije kontaktirajte me na +385 91 534 9959 ili na mail: t.tomic@remax.hr (Tonka). Dodatne informacije o nekretnini, njezinoj točnoj lokaciji i razgledavanje mogući su nakon potpisivanja Ugovora o posredovanju s Agencijom, koji je u skladu sa Zakonom o zaštiti podataka i Zakonom o posredovanju u prometu nekretnina. -------------------------------- NEW ON OFFER!!! WONDERFUL LOCATION!!! We are selling a beautiful house with a swimming pool in Lokva Rogoznica, ideally located only 500 meters from the sea and the beach. The house, with a floor plan of 127 m², consists of two spacious two-room residential units, perfect for a family or tourist rental. The ground floor of the house offers an apartment of 63 m², with an entrance hall, two bedrooms, a bathroom, a storage room and an open living area. The living room leads to a covered terrace, enriched with Mediterranean greenery, creating an ideal place to relax in the fresh air. On the first floor there is another two-room apartment with two bathrooms, a hallway and an open living area. From the living room you can access a spacious balcony with an incredible view of the sea and the nearby islands. In front of the house, lower than the ground floor, there is a 25 m² swimming pool, which offers relaxation with a wonderful combination of sky and sea. Behind the house there is parking for several cars, while the floors are connected by external stairs. The house has access to an asphalted road, as well as water and electricity connections. The house is fully furnished. All the necessary facilities are nearby, such as cafes, restaurants and shops, while the city of Omiš is only 10 km away, providing all the additional benefits for a pleasant life or vacation. The buyer pays the agency commission. For all information, contact me at +385 91 534 9959 or by email: t.tomic@remax.hr (Tonka). Additional information about the property, its exact location and a viewing are possible after signing the Brokerage Agreement with the Agency, which is in accordance with the Data Protection Act and the Real Estate Brokerage Act.
